description:
A beautiful four story home in Marine Park, offering you comfort, luxury and space. 

There two free bedrooms, making it perfect for visiting families or groups of friends. You will have your own private kitchen, bathroom, living room and home entertainment system to use, in the ground floor, but are welcome to any part of the house. Backyard grill and deck available.

We prefer not to host those who live locally.

It's huge, and affords all the comforts you would have in your usual home, even while on vacation.

Backyard, driveway, laundry/dryer

When they need help

It's at the intersection of three different neighborhoods, so u get to experience everything

Trains and bus

There is a cat! If you have allergies you shouldn't book. 
We also ask that you be conscientious when entering and leaving the home so the cat does not get out.
name: New! Contemporary Brooklyn Home
review: The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
